result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on November 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:38 AM Defendant Francis R. Schuman in court, in custody from the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Daniel Francis Snyder in court for Francis R. Schuman. Attorney Snyder is here for 21CF342 and 21CF390. Called these two cases for status to put on calendar with two older cases that he is represented in. Bond continued.

10:01 AM Defendant Francis R. Schuman in court, in custody from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Court speaks to defendant still waiting for counsel. Defendant is waiting to be revoked by Oneida County. Court adjourns hearing to hopefully get an attorney through PD Office. Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.

10:21 AM Defendant Francis R. Schuman in court in custody from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Still waiting on public defender representation.  Bond continued.
Status hearing scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:22 AM Defendant Francis R. Schuman in court, in custody without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Bond continued
Adjourned for status proceedings scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Cases 22CF36 and 22CF89 are conflict cases for Attorney Snyder.  DA Karl Hayes appears in court for State of Wisconsin. Public Defender is still seeking counsel for defendant.  Bond continued.
Status hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:48 AM Defendant Francis R. Schuman in court, in custody.  Attorney Snyder present by video, however has conflict and only represents defendant in the 2021 cases.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Public defender is seeking counsel for defendant in his 2022 cases.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.
